plot: Sha Shtil is the story of filmmaker Ben Feferman's quest to find out what is really happening in Canada's Jewish community. How are the leaders selected? Who decides how money is spent? ...
title: Sha Shtil: Inside Canada's Jewish Establishment
plot_es: Sha Shtil is the story of filmmaker Ben Feferman's quest to find out what is really happening in Canada's Jewish community. How are the leaders selected? Who decides how money is spent? ...
original_name: Sha Shtil: Inside Canada's Jewish Establishment
